messages.text:

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4e3a1967af09 ***

io: document ReaderFrom and WriterTo

Fixes issue 3711

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6445083

http://codereview.appspot.com/6445083/diff/4002/src/pkg/io/io.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/6445083/diff/4002/src/pkg/io/io.go#newcode138
src/pkg/io/io.go:138: // ReaderFrom is used by the Copy function.
The Copy function uses ReaderFrom if available.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6445083/diff/4002/src/pkg/io/io.go#newcode149
src/pkg/io/io.go:149: // WriterTo is used by the Copy function.
ditto

http://codereview.appspot.com/6445083/diff/8002/src/pkg/io/io.go

src/pkg/io/io.go:134: // ReadFrom reads data from r until EOF. The return value n is the
EOF or error.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
